```{r, include=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# **************************************************************************** #
#                   baby_mom_link Data Import                           
# **************************************************************************** #

# GAINESVILLE Data Directory:
data_file_name <- "GNV_mom_baby_link_20250417.rda"
data_dir <- paste0("V:/FACULTY/DJLEMAS/EHR_Data/processed/READ_ONLY_DATASETS/10year_data/GNV/")
data_import_path <- paste0(data_dir, data_file_name)
load(data_import_path)

# JACKSONVILLE Data Directory:
data_file_name <- "JAX_mom_baby_link_20250418.rda"
data_dir <- paste0("V:/FACULTY/DJLEMAS/EHR_Data/processed/READ_ONLY_DATASETS/10year_data/JAX/")
data_import_path <- paste0(data_dir, data_file_name)
load(data_import_path)

# merge data
mom_baby_link_ALL=rbind(GNV_mom_baby_link_04_2025, JAX_mom_baby_link_04_2025)

```

```{r, message=FALSE}
# **************************************************************************** #
#                      Export Processed Mom-Baby Link Data                     
# **************************************************************************** #

# Task:
# - Export the processed mom_baby_link data as an RDA file.
# - Save the file to the shared drive for further analysis.

# File Name and Export Path:
file_name <- "mom_baby_link_ALL"
timestamp <- format(Sys.time(), "_%Y%m%d")
file_name_path=paste0(file_name,timestamp,".rda")
data_export_directory <- paste0("V:/FACULTY/DJLEMAS/EHR_Data/processed/READ_ONLY_DATASETS/10year_data/")
data_export_path <- paste0(data_export_directory, file_name_path)

# Export the data:
mom_baby_link_ALL %>%
  save(mom_baby_link_ALL, file = data_export_path)

```
